snippet: A local stockbroker and financial columnist, Sky Cheung, has been fined about $65,000 by Hong Kong’s market regulator for profiting on stock trades linked to his column. His broker’s license was also suspended for 30 months.
abstract: A local stockbroker and financial columnist, Sky Cheung, has been fined about $65,000 by Hong Kong’s market regulator for profiting on stock trades linked to his column. His broker’s license was also suspended for 30 months.

headline.main: Hong Kong Broker Fined for Hyping Undisclosed Trades
